name: ABRY Mirrored Business Card Holder with Swarovski Crystals
description: Every opportunity presents a chance to reach your dream. Extend yourself with elegance in this sleek business card holder, with a beautiful button in Swarovski crystals, set against a glossy black finish. Comes with a convenient hidden mirror, for looking stylish at every occasion. Ideal for international travellers. Perfect as a gift. Complimentary 2009 calendar within.
